comments:
Creating an empty plugin and attempting to generate the plugin Jar file will 
result in a java.lang.NullPointerException. 
Steps to follow: New -> Plug-in developement -> Plug-in Project -> MyPlugin, 
Use default location; Keep default options; Create a blank plug-inFinish; 
Select plugin.xml; Create Plug-in JARs; Keep default options; Finish; ---> 
java.lang.NullPointerException).
